price: 73 Vous y disposerez de toutes les variétés de fruits dont vous vous délecterez. »
arabic: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ كَثِيرَةٞ مِّنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: lakum fīhā fākihatun kathīratun min'hā takulūna
